title: Small doubt from a fresher
content: I'm gonna join PESU EC campus for B.tech CSE this year (2024) through KCET last round . Since the Classes have started a month ago idk how I'll cope up with academics...I came to know that we'll get ppt,notes etc online similarly someone said we'll hv access to recordings of all the lectures online but I couldn't find any info on that so my I wanna know 'is it true or not'. I'd appreciate if anyone could elaborate on it ðŸ˜Š

comments.body: It's true. Once you join, you'll get your credentials and then you can access the content don't worry.
Does that mean i'm not missing outÂ  anything or how is it ?
You might have classes from 8am till 4pm or more all 5 days of the week to catch upðŸ˜¬
You won't. The portal has all the content in it.

All the material in case you want get started ðŸ«°
